languages.text: {n}Ваши слова вырывают Ирлиэт из оков помутнения.{/n} "Как ты узнал{mf||а}? {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Мон-кай{/g} не под силу услышать зов бессмертной души Дитя Азуриана. Неужели простая догадка? Но ты абсолютно прав{mf||а}, элатнах. В своих пытках Темные заходят далеко за грани возможного. Ибо в этих фигурах, в этой доске для увеселительных игр разума... заточена душа провидицы".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ваши слова вырывают Ирлиэт из оков помутнения.{/n} "Как ты узнал{mf||а}? {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Мон-кай{/g} не под силу услышать зов бессмертной души Дитя Азуриана. Неужели простая догадка? Но ты абсолютно прав{mf||а}, элатнах. В своих пытках Темные заходят далеко за грани возможного. Ибо в этих фигурах, в этой доске для увеселительных игр разума... заточена душа провидицы".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Your words snap Yrliet back from her lapse of reason.{/n} "How did you know? A {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} is incapable of hearing the call of the immortal soul of a Child of Asuryan. Could it have been a simple guess? Yet you are absolutely right, elantach. In their torture, the Dark Ones go far beyond the limits of the possible. For imprisoned within these game pieces, within this board designed for games that intrigue the mind... is the soul of a Farseer."

Ибо в этих фигурах, в этой доске для увеселительных игр разума... заточена душа провидицы".

languages.text: {n}Tus palabras sacan a Yrliet de su ensimismamiento.{/n} «¿Cómo lo has sabido? Los {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} son incapaces de oír la llamada del alma inmortal de una hija de Asuryan. ¿Lo has adivinado sin más? El caso es que tienes razón, elantach. En su tortura, los Oscuros han excedido todos los límites de lo posible. Prisionera dentro de estas piezas, en este tablero de juego diseñado para estimular la mente... está el alma de una vidente».
languages.original_text: {n}Your words snap Yrliet back from her lapse of reason.{/n} "How did you know? A {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} is incapable of hearing the call of the immortal soul of a Child of Asuryan. Could it have been a simple guess? Yet you are absolutely right, elantach. In their torture, the Dark Ones go far beyond the limits of the possible. For imprisoned within these game pieces, within this board designed for games that intrigue the mind... is the soul of a Farseer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tus palabras sacan a Yrliet de su ensimismamiento.{/n} «¿Cómo lo has sabido? Los {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} son incapaces de oír la llamada del alma inmortal de una hija de Asuryan. ¿Lo has adivinado sin más? El caso es que tienes razón, elantach. En su tortura, los Oscuros han excedido todos los límites de lo posible. Prisionera dentro de estas piezas, en este tablero de juego diseñado para estimular la mente... está el alma de una vidente».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたの言葉が、ユリエットを我に返させた。{/n} 「なぜ分かった？{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g} はアシュリアンの御子の不滅の魂の呼びかけを聞くことはできないはず。ただ言い当てただけか？だが、あなたの言う通りだ、エランタ。暗黒の者たちの拷問は、可能の限界を超えている。なぜなら、これらの駒の中に、この心を惑わす遊戯盤の中に封じ込められているのは…先見司の魂だからだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Your words snap Yrliet back from her lapse of reason.{/n} "How did you know? A {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} is incapable of hearing the call of the immortal soul of a Child of Asuryan. Could it have been a simple guess? Yet you are absolutely right, elantach. In their torture, the Dark Ones go far beyond the limits of the possible. For imprisoned within these game pieces, within this board designed for games that intrigue the mind... is the soul of a Farseer."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの言葉が、ユリエットを我に返させた。{/n} 「なぜ分かった？{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g} はアシュリアンの御子の不滅の魂の呼びかけを聞くことはできないはず。ただ言い当てただけか？だが、あなたの言う通りだ、エランタ。暗黒の者たちの拷問は、可能の限界を超えている。なぜなら、これらの駒の中に、この心を惑わす遊戯盤の中に封じ込められているのは…先見司の魂だからだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}你的话语使伊莉耶特从失神中恢复过来。{/n}“你是怎么知道的？{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}根本听不到位阿苏焉之子不朽灵魂的呼唤，莫非这只是你的猜测吗？不过，你说得完全正确。黑暗子嗣的折磨远远超出了肉体和灵魂可能存在的极限。这些棋子里，这个用来娱乐的棋盘里……囚禁着克鲁达拉赫先知的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: {n}Your words snap Yrliet back from her lapse of reason.{/n} "How did you know? A {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} is incapable of hearing the call of the immortal soul of a Child of Asuryan. Could it have been a simple guess? Yet you are absolutely right, elantach. In their torture, the Dark Ones go far beyond the limits of the possible. For imprisoned within these game pieces, within this board designed for games that intrigue the mind... is the soul of a Farseer."

traits.locale_text: {n}你的话语使伊莉耶特从失神中恢复过来。{/n}“你是怎么知道的？{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}根本听不到位阿苏焉之子不朽灵魂的呼唤，莫非这只是你的猜测吗？不过，你说得完全正确。黑暗子嗣的折磨远远超出了肉体和灵魂可能存在的极限。这些棋子里，这个用来娱乐的棋盘里……囚禁着克鲁达拉赫先知的灵魂。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vos paroles font revenir Yrliet à la raison.{/n} « Comment avez-vous su ? Les {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} ne peuvent pas entendre l'appel de l'âme immortelle d'un enfant d'Asuryan. Avez-vous simplement deviné ? Quoi qu'il en soit, vous avez parfaitement raison, elantach. Dans leur torture, les Eldars noirs vont bien au-delà des limites du possible. Car, emprisonnée dans ces pions, dans ce plateau de jeux d'esprit... se trouve l'âme d'un Grand Prophète de Crudarach. »
languages.original_text: {n}Your words snap Yrliet back from her lapse of reason.{/n} "How did you know? A {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} is incapable of hearing the call of the immortal soul of a Child of Asuryan. Could it have been a simple guess? Yet you are absolutely right, elantach. In their torture, the Dark Ones go far beyond the limits of the possible. For imprisoned within these game pieces, within this board designed for games that intrigue the mind... is the soul of a Farseer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vos paroles font revenir Yrliet à la raison.{/n} « Comment avez-vous su ? Les {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} ne peuvent pas entendre l'appel de l'âme immortelle d'un enfant d'Asuryan. Avez-vous simplement deviné ? Quoi qu'il en soit, vous avez parfaitement raison, elantach. Dans leur torture, les Eldars noirs vont bien au-delà des limites du possible. Car, emprisonnée dans ces pions, dans ce plateau de jeux d'esprit... se trouve l'âme d'un Grand Prophète de Crudarach. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Deine Worte bringen Yrliet wieder zu Vernunft.{/n} "Woher wusstet Ihr das? {mf|Ein|Eine} {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g} ist nicht dazu in der Lage, den Ruf der unsterblichen Seele eines Kinds von Asuryan zu hören. Oder habt Ihr einfach nur geraten? Denn Ihr habt völlig recht, Elantach. Wenn die Dunklen foltern, kennen sie keine Grenzen. Hier in den Spielfiguren auf dem Spielbrett, das eigentlich den Geist von Spielern anregen soll, wird ... die Seele einer Runenprophetin gefangen gehalten."
languages.original_text: {n}Your words snap Yrliet back from her lapse of reason.{/n} "How did you know? A {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} is incapable of hearing the call of the immortal soul of a Child of Asuryan. Could it have been a simple guess? Yet you are absolutely right, elantach. In their torture, the Dark Ones go far beyond the limits of the possible. For imprisoned within these game pieces, within this board designed for games that intrigue the mind... is the soul of a Farseer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Worte bringen Yrliet wieder zu Vernunft.{/n} "Woher wusstet Ihr das? {Mf|Ein|Eine {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g} ist nicht dazu in der Lage, den Ruf der unsterblichen Seele eines Kinds von Asuryan zu hören. Oder habt Ihr einfach nur geraten? Denn Ihr habt völlig recht, Elantach. Wenn die Dunklen foltern, kennen sie keine Grenzen. Hier in den Spielfiguren auf dem Spielbrett, das eigentlich den Geist von Spielern anregen soll, wird ... die Seele einer Runenprophetin gefangen gehalten."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sözlerin, Yrliet'i kendine getiriyor.{/n} "Nasıl bildin? {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Mon-keighler{/g}, bir Asuryan'ın Çocuğu'nun ölümsüz ruhunun çağrısını duyamaz. Tahminde mi bulundun yoksa? Her hâlükârda çok doğru söyledin elantach. Karalar, işkenceleri esnasında mümkün olanın hudutlarını katbekat aşar. Zira bir Ötesezen'in ruhu... Zihin kandıran oyunlara özel tasarlanmış bu oyun tahtasına, bu taşlara hapistir."
languages.original_text: {n}Your words snap Yrliet back from her lapse of reason.{/n} "How did you know? A {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} is incapable of hearing the call of the immortal soul of a Child of Asuryan. Could it have been a simple guess? Yet you are absolutely right, elantach. In their torture, the Dark Ones go far beyond the limits of the possible. For imprisoned within these game pieces, within this board designed for games that intrigue the mind... is the soul of a Farseer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sözlerin, Yrliet'i mantığını kaybettiği vaziyetten çekip çıkarıyor.{/n} "Nasıl bildin? {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Mon-keigh{/g}ler, bir Asuryan'ın Çocuğu'na ait ölümsüz ruhun çağrısını duyamazlar. Sadece sıradan bir tahmin miydi? Her hâlükârda kesinlikle haklısın elantach. Karalar, işkenceleri esnasında mümkün olanın hudutlarını katbekat aşarlar. Zira zihinleri kandıran oyunlar için tasarlanmış bu oyun tahtasında, bu oyun parçaları içinde hapsedilen... Bir Ötesezen'in ruhu."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
